amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: TITLE VI--ADDITIONAL GENERAL PROVISIONS SEC. 601. None of the funds made available for this Act may be used for the Columbus Fire Fighters Union in Columbus, Ohio.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit funds to be used for the Columbus Fire Fighters Union in Columbus, Ohio.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A043) Failed by recorded vote: 66 - 364 (Roll no. 568).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A043) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A043) Failed by recorded vote: 66 - 364 (Roll no. 568).
